name: Remote Service Activity via SVCCTL Named Pipe
description: Detects remote service activity via remote access to the svcctl named pipe
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Security AND event.code:5145 AND winlog.event_data.ShareName:\\\\\*\\IPC$ AND winlog.event_data.RelativeTargetName:svcctl AND winlog.event_data.Accesses:*WriteData*)`
